name: personserver
description: Helsinki University MOOC Fullstack open "person server", chapter 3

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstack/osa2/puhelinluettelo && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../personserver/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: rikusarlin
